TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit AttachedPropertyBrowsableAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public MustInherit Class AttachedPropertyBrowsableAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class AttachedPropertyBrowsableAttribute abstract : Attribute

summary.span: 为报告附加属性使用范围的 .NET Framework 特性提供基类。

span.span: Provides a base class for .NET Framework attributes that report the use scope of attached properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 术语的含义`browsable`此说明中使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]（和派生类） 类似于为提供的说明，但附加的属性的可浏览状态是专门针对属性信息[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]，因为附加的属性是主要[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]概念。The meaning of the term `browsable` as used in descriptions for this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] (and derived classes) is analogous to the descriptions given for , but the browsable state for an attached property is particularly relevant to property information for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], because an attached property is primarily a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] concept.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.
